ModMetaData.name: Undergrounders: Anticillin
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
This mod adds a new drug, anticillin, which is produced from anticillum mold. Anticillin is an impressive antibiotic, and has proven effective at fighting all kinds of infections.
Anticillin mold must be grown in a hydroponics basin, and requires medicine production to be researched.
Also adds an enhanced version that must be crafted with neutroamine.
